LanguageData.CookMealSmallSimple.label: cook small simple meal
LanguageData.CookMealSmallSimple.description: Cook a straightforward meal from one ingredient, sized for something smaller than a human.
LanguageData.CookMealSmallFine.label: cook small fine meal
LanguageData.CookMealSmallFine.description: Cook a somewhat complex meal from a combination of meat and plant ingredients, sized for something smaller than a human.
LanguageData.CookMealSmallLavish.label: cook small lavish meal
LanguageData.CookMealSmallLavish.description: Cook a very complex meal from a combination of meat and plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted. Sized for something smaller than a human.
LanguageData.CookMealSmallSurvival.label: cook small packaged survival meal
LanguageData.CookMealSmallSurvival.description: Prepare a packaged survival meal from a combination of meat and plant ingredients, sized for something smaller than a human. Much of the ingredients are wasted in the preservation process.
LanguageData.CookAvaliSpicyJerky.label: cook spicy jerky
LanguageData.CookAvaliSpicyJerky.description: Cooks a chunks of seasoned jerky, popular with hunters and explorers.
LanguageData.CookAvaliPiruNoodle.label: cook piru noodle
LanguageData.CookAvaliPiruNoodle.description: Cooks a sweet noodles made from Piru frond flour, a staple of Avali students.
LanguageData.CookAvaliKiriCurry.label: cook kiri curry
LanguageData.CookAvaliKiriCurry.description: Cooks a spicy meat noodles with a rich Kiri sauce.
LanguageData.CookAvaliTaco.label: cook Avalon-style taco
LanguageData.CookAvaliTaco.description: Cooks a super-hot Nakati-spiced taco; sometimes eaten on a dare by non-Avali.
LanguageData.CookAvaliEggOmlette.label: cook avali egg omlette
LanguageData.CookAvaliEggOmlette.description: Cooks avali egg omlette. It's a very tasty for everyone exept Avali.
